testcase.name: Validate the name and surname after registering with required details
testcase.system-out: Given Launch the browser "Chrome" and navigate to automation test store application.passed And Click on login or register button.......................................passed When Click on Continue button...............................................passed And User enter name "Narsing" surname "rao" email "automation888@gmail.com" loginname "automation777" and other details in register page.passed When Click on Continue button...............................................passed Then Validate the name "Narsing" and surname "rao" on landing screen........passed And User logout the test store application..................................passed
